sentences: In February 2011, Parenteau signed with the record label 306 Records/EMI Music Canada to help distribute his albums.
In 1991, Parenteau was playing in Edmonton, Alberta and was invited to a show by Neal McCoy who was also playing in Edmonton.
After performing with Neal McCoy for 12 years and playing 250â€“300 shows a year, Parenteau returned to Prince Albert to embark on a solo career.
In 2001 SCMA International Humanitarian Award for his efforts.
He also embarks on a tour of elementary schools in Saskatchewan each year as a motivational speaker in which he spreads his message of anti-bullying.
Parenteau has been nominated for a multitude of awards all across Canada picking up a number of them along the way.
In 2008, Parenteau was nominated for his country's highest honour by being nominated for a Juno Award.
